channel.title: Pages on Desi Penguin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Desi Penguin's Blog

item.title: About
item.description: History This is probably nth incarnation of this blog. I started with hosted wordpress. (Still available here) Then I moved to self hosted wordpress, but I lost the access to it, due to my neglegence (Read about it here) I was also on (now dead) posterous. Finally I decided to move away from “hosted” blogs, and moved to SSG. I started with pelican. It took me a while to find a decent theme.
